label: 来迎図
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: The painting depicted the Buddha Amida and one attached a five-coloured piece of string to the painting which the dying wroshipper could keep in her or his hand.  [Also see injōe (引接会）]
